text: The first season of the TV series Arthur aired between October 7 to November 15, 1996. ==Overview== First release Last release First episode Last episode Arthur's Eyes Arthur's New Year's Eve ==Episodes== Title Original release date Summary 1a Arthur's Eyes Francine teases Arthur for getting glasses. 1b Francine's Bad Hair Day Francine doesn't get the haircut she wanted. 30a Arthur's First Sleepover November 15, 1996 Arthur and his friends are too scared to sleepover. 30b Arthur's New Year's Eve November 15, 1996 Arthur wants to stay up until 12 a.m. ==References== Category:1990s television seasons Category:Arthur (TV series) seasons
title: Arthur season 1
